results.name: Irregular triangular array read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of derangement permutations of [n] that have exactly k inversions; n>=2, 1<=k<=binomial(n,2) for even n, 1<=k<=binomial(n,2)-1 for odd n.
comment: Sum_{even k} T(n,k) = A003221(n) and Sum_{odd k} T(n,k) = A000387(n).
It would be nice to have a closed formula for T(n,k). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 31 2014
